body:
Dear Thomas,


unfortunately it doesn’t help. I’ve already tried it out with SketchUp Make 2015 and 2016. Could there possibly be any problem with the “Make” version or with my Windows version? I use Windows 7 Enterprise Service Pack 1 (64-bit). I would be grateful for any hint.


Best regards,
Marzena




Von: Thomas Bleicher [mailto:tbleicher at gmail.com] 
Gesendet: Sonntag, 17. April 2016 15:16
An: Radiance general discussion
Cc: DAYSIM discussion
Betreff: Re: [Radiance-general] su2rad export problem


Hi Marzena


Please update to the latest release su2rad_2014.0.0. This should fix the problem. You can download it via the link below:


 <https://www.dropbox.com/s/pewocv4df0i2i05/su2rad_2014.0.0.rbz> https://www.dropbox.com/s/pewocv4df0i2i05/su2rad_2014.0.0.rbz


Regards,


Thomas
